trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for installed and private font collections.
The <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection> allows you to get a list of the font families contained in the collection with its <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection.Families%2A> property.
For additional information on fonts and text, including example code, see [Using Fonts and Text](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/using-fonts-and-text.md).
Releases all resources used by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection"></xref>.
Call <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>.
The <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection> in an unusable state.

After calling <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection> was occupying.

For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
Always call <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection>.
Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection> object's `Finalize` method.
Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection> references.
This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
`true` to release both managed and unmanaged resources; `false` to release only unmanaged resources.
Gets the array of <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> objects associated with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection"></xref>.
An array of <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> objects.
Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
